pixi.filters.blur.BlurFilter

type
class
extends
pixi.core.renderers.webgl.filters.AbstractFilter
metadata
:native
"PIXI.filters.BlurFilter"

Constructor

new()
The BlurFilter applies a Gaussian blur to an object. The strength of the blur can be set for x- and y-axis separately.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

blur : Float

Sets the strength of both the blurX and blurY properties simultaneously

blurX : Float

Sets the strength of the blurX property

blurY : Float

Sets the strength of the blurY property

padding : Float

inherited from pixi.core.renderers.webgl.filters.AbstractFilter
The extra padding that the filter might need

passes : Int

Sets the number of passes for blur. More passes means higher quaility bluring.
